Welcome to MkConfig’s documentation!¶

Overview¶

Overview
--------
MkConfig is a python based,  general purposed configuration generator. All of the implementation should follow
PEP-8 standard.

Library Dependency
------------------
1. Jinja2

Supported Configuration
-----------------------
Here are types of configuration supported :
1. <Subject to Add>

(from README)
